title: Astounding Science Fiction v39n6
creator: Street and Smith Publications
description: Astounding Science Fiction , Volume 39 Number 6, August of 1947. Published by Street & Smith Publications, Inc., New York, NY. 164 pages. Cover art by Hubert Rogers. Edited by John W. Campbell, Jr. Featuring essays by John W. Campbell, Jr. as The Editor, John R. Pierce as by J. J. Coupling and  R. S. Richardson. Includes the following works of fiction: The End Is Not Yet (Part 1 of 3), a serial novel by L. Ron Hubbard. Rat Race, a shortstory by George O. Smith. Insomnia, Inc., a novelette by Harry Walton. The Person from Porlock, a shortstory by Raymond F. Jones. Propagandist, a shortstory by Murray Leinster.
